      • getAllRecurringTransfersForAccount

        public static java.util.List<RecurringTransfer> getAllRecurringTransfersForAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns all the recurring transfers associated with the account with the specified accountnumber in the database.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - is the number needed to retrieve the Account-object from the DB.
        Returns:
        a list with all the RecurringTransfers.

      • addRecurringTransfer

        public static void addRecurringTransfer(java.lang.String sendingAccount,
                                        java.lang.String receivingAccount,
                                        java.math.BigInteger kroner,
                                        int oere,
                                        java.lang.String message,
                                        java.lang.String interval,
                                        long endDate)
        Creates a recurringtransfer from an account to another.
        Parameters:
        sendingAccount - is the accountNumber of the sendingaccount.
        receivingAccount - is the accountnumber for the receivingaccount.
        kroner - is the amount of kroner being transfered.
        oere - is the amount of oere being transfered.
        message - is the message associated with the recurring transfer.
        interval - determines how often the transfer is going to happend.
        endDate - is the date that stops this recurring transfer.
